Field Detail

built

protected boolean built
Keeps track of whether or not this tree has been fully constructed. Will be false for either an empty tree or one that's in the process of being built

fileCount

protected static long fileCount
The total number of files stored in this tree. Does not include directories

root

protected Node root
The root of this Directory Tree. This Node is the only way that the tree elements can be traversed

runningTime

protected long runningTime
The total time taken to construct this DirectoryTree

totalSize

protected long totalSize
The collective size of all files in this tree

Constructor Detail

AbstractDirectoryTree

public AbstractDirectoryTree(Node root)
Instantiates the Directory Tree with the specified node as Root. Tree propagation won't occur until the build() method is called

Parameters:
root -

AbstractDirectoryTree

public AbstractDirectoryTree(java.lang.String rootPath)
Instantiates a Directory Tree with root Path being the path of the root Node. Tree propagation won't occur until the build() method is called

Parameters:
root -

recalculateSize

private long recalculateSize(Node n)
Recalculates the sizes of all nodes by summing the sizes of their child nodes. This is required since Java doesn't automatically determine the sizes of folders

Parameters:
n -
Returns:

recalculateSizes

public void recalculateSizes()
Once the tree structure has been created, the sizes of all directories are recalculated
